title: Top countries by pharmaceutical industry employment 2014
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of employees in the y axis.
The maximum Number of employees 2301534.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Turkey where Country is 35100.0.
There is a difference of 2266434.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Turkey.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 20 number of Countrys.
Country China has the highest Number of employees and Turkey has the lowest Number of employees.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of employees in the y axis.
The maximum Number of employees 2301534.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Turkey where Country is 35100.0.
There is a difference of 2266434.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Turkey.
max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of employees in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of employees is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Turkey.
Second maximum Number of employees is found at Country India.
There is a difference of 2266434.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Turkey.
Number of employees at Country China is 2301534.0 , second place is India at 567469.0, and thirdly is United States at 251995.0.
The Country Turkey has 11.21 times less Number of employees than average.
The Number of employees is 4107396.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
